languages.text: Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью от применения {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Кровавого дождя{/g} или {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g}, требует от персонажа вдвое меньше ОП.
languages.original_text: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.

traits.locale_text: Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью от применения {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Кровавого дождя{/g} или {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g}, требует от персонажа вдвое меньше ОП.

languages.text: Atravesar casillas afectadas por {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Lluvia de sangre{/g} o un {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}frasco de sangre{/g} cuesta −50 % de PM para el portador.
languages.original_text: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.

traits.locale_text: Atravesar casillas afectadas por {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Lluvia de sangre{/g} o un {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}frasco de sangre{/g} cuesta −50 % de PM para el portador.

languages.text: セルの移動が{g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}血の雨{/g}または{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}血の小瓶{/g}の影響を受け、使用者のMP使用量が−50%減る。
languages.original_text: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.

traits.locale_text: セルの移動が{g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}血の雨{/g}または{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}血の小瓶{/g}に影響され、使用者のMP使用量が−50%減る。

languages.text: 当装备者经过受{g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}血如雨下{/g}或{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}鲜血安瓿{/g}效果影响的格子时，消耗的移动点数降低50%。
languages.original_text: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者经过受{g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}血如雨下{/g}或{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}鲜血安瓿{/g}效果影响的格子时，消耗的移动点数降低50%。

languages.text: Se déplacer sur des cases affectées par {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Pluie de sang{/g} ou {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Fiole de sang{/g} coûte −50 % de PD au porteur.
languages.original_text: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.

traits.locale_text: Se déplacer sur des cases affectées par {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Pluie de sang{/g} ou {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Fiole de sang{/g} coûte -50 % de PD au porteur.

languages.text: Die Bewegung über Zellen unter dem Einfluss von {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Blutregen{/g} oder {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blutphiole{/g} kostet den Träger −50 % BP.
languages.original_text: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.

traits.locale_text: Die Bewegung über Zellen unter dem Einfluss von {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Blutregen{/g} oder {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blutphiole{/g} kostet den Träger -50 % BP.

languages.text: {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Yağan Kan{/g} veya {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}kan tüpünden{/g} etkilenen hücrelerden geçmek giyen kişiye %50 daha az HP harcatır.
languages.original_text: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.
